I just recently read an article on abcnews.go.com , about the assassination of Kim Jong Nam, the half brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in a Malaysian airport. Two Vietnamese women attacked Kim with VX Nerve Agent on their hands and clothing effectively administering a lethal enough dose to prove fatal. It was very surprising...
